items.name: Gateway Project
items.description: Gateway is base on HTMl and CSS. We had to choose a country and I choosed Indonesia is centrally-located along ancient.

items.name: Hotel App
items.description: This Hotel App consists of information and organized with images. It was most focus on Dubai.

items.name: Speech Recognition Guessing Game API
items.description: Modern guessing game with speech recognition feature. You need to speech throug the microphone and guess a number.

items.name: Animated Navigation Bar
items.description: Navbar specifically designed and developed for animation websites as well as for responsive apps.

items.name: Github Page Locator Ap
items.description: Used GitHub API to create an app that will help you locate users with just entering their Github username.

items.name: React Tic Tac Toe
items.description: Fun tic tac toe game created with React. You can play this with your friends and family, it will show the winner and if their is a tie.

items.name: Friend List App Game
items.description: Designed and developed cards with a list of cards with friends. You are able to delete any friend of your list if you want.

items.name: Pokemon Inquirer
items.description: This Pokemon-Inquirer cards must be run in your Terminal. This will not be showed in the browser
items.gitHub: This is a very interesting node application, where you are able to train a pokemon of your choice. If you would like to see it in action, clone my GitHub Repo and run it in Terminal.

items.name: Ecommerce Project Version One
items.description: This website holds a Home Page with a JavaScript slider. This this an E-commerce that contains 12 products and also a contact form.

items.name: Ecommerce Project Version Two With React
items.description: This is just the product page created with React. This version holds a filter that filters products with Type and Price of every product.

items.name: Wikipedia Re-design Project
items.description: This website was base on Re-designing wikipedia and making improvement on the website. This was a group project, were I was able to colaborate and integrate parts of codes.

items.name: Counter App
items.description: This website was base on Re-designing wikipedia and making improvement on the website. This was a group project, were I was able to colaborate and integrate parts of codes.
